p: Human infections may have commenced months before the recognized outbreak in Wuhan. Most human pathogens originate as pathogens of other animals; they occupy a spectrum, emerging from those exclusively transmitted among animals to those primarily transmitted among other animals, to those that have lost their dependence on non-human reservoirs and, ultimately, those no longer capable of being transmitted excepting from person to person ( Wolfe et al., 2007). The human drama now unfolding began, in earnest, in the latter months of 2019; the tree above records the virus's subsequent proliferation and spread. But, what can be said about preceding events?
